body_html: Starting from cudnn v6 the structure returned by cudnnFindAlgorithm contains determinism field. From performance point of view, if benchmarking is on, and cudnnFind is called anyway, it is better to return the whole structure (rather than only the first member) and pick the fastest deterministic algo.
body_text: Starting from cudnn v6 the structure returned by cudnnFindAlgorithm contains determinism field. From performance point of view, if benchmarking is on, and cudnnFind is called anyway, it is better to return the whole structure (rather than only the first member) and pick the fastest deterministic algo.
body: Starting from cudnn v6 the structure returned by cudnnFindAlgorithm contains determinism field. From performance point of view, if benchmarking is on, and cudnnFind is called anyway, it is better to return the whole structure (rather than only the first member) and pick the fastest deterministic algo.
